intro_0.text: Listen, I'm telling you! The dark mages will come back.

intro_1.text: The seal is weakening. We must prepare for the worst.

intro_2.text: We need the Sky Buster to be more powerful than ever.

intro_3.text: It is already the most powerful weapon in the world!

intro_4.text: Wanna bet? I'll show you! It can't even leave a mark on the moon!

intro_5.text: Hmm ... I don't know. It's too dangerous.

intro_6.text: I'll do it! I'll show you!

intro_8.text: It shouldn't be this bright. It's too bright!

intro_12.text: We have to fix that! I'm going to see if the Ice Mage can help.

outro_1.text: BLUE! What did you do to the moon?

outro_2.text: I shot the moon with the Sky Buster!

outro_3.text: You idiot! The Sky Buster is a magic weapon!

outro_4.text: The moon is a magic amplifier! You just amplified the Sky Buster!

outro_5.text: Oh no! What do we do?

outro_6.text: The only way to protect us from the debris would be to cast a world wide shield.

outro_7.text: But that would require a lot of magic power. We don't have time to gather mages.

outro_8.text: I should be able to do it alone. After all, I'm the most powerful mage in the world.

outro_9.text: But I'll need to convert my experience into magic power. I'll need a lot of it.

outro_10.text: Wait mom, you can't do that!

outro_11.text: You'll lose your title as the Greatest Mage of the Sky Realm!

outro_12.text: It's the only way. Plus I've been the strongest mage for a 1000 years.

outro_13.text: It's time for you to take over.

outro_14.text: Blue, do you have the Crystal Book I lend you?

outro_102.text: I won't be able to cast any spell for a while but the barrier should be able to keep us safe.

outro_104.text: Blue. I know you are worried about the dark mages.

outro_105.text: But I don't think that nuclear force is the answer.

outro_107.text: I just don't want a new accident to happen again.

outro_108.text: Speak of which. With me out of magic, Jevin still missing & Pauline gone, we are not in a good position.

outro_109.text: Let's hope the dark mages don't attack us anytime soon.

outro_110.text: Don't worry. I'm working on a new defense system.

outro_111.text: You better not make any mistake this time.
